name: Toys Wars
description:
Every night when you go to sleep... the war begins!

Pick your teddies and lead them to victory! Don't let the enemy destroy your doll house, and remember: you have a secret teddy, use it wisely.

This game is local-multiplayer, so you will need a friend to fight. Yellow Team controls: 

WASD -- Move

Blue Team controls:

Directional keys -- Move

Credits:  I didn't made any art or music/sounds for this game. - Art has been taken from Unity Team (Zombie Toys game project). - Music & Sounds are credited in game menu. - Volumetric Lights Script made by Michal Skalsky.
